meanings.definition: Resembling a sphere in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The spherular toy rolled smoothly on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The planets in the solar system are spherular in shape.
meanings.sent3: The spherular snowman looked perfectly round and cute.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the spherular room, bouncing off the walls.
meanings.sent5: The spherular crystal ball revealed the future with a mysterious glow.
